00024  #include <ext/hash_map>

00028 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00029 
00030 class debugmon
00031 {
00032     struct tag
00033     {
00034         bool ongoing;
00035         char * end;
00036         size_t size;
00037     };
00038     struct hash_fct
00039     {
00040         inline size_t operator ()  (char * arg) const
00041         {
00042             return long (arg);
00043         }
00044     };
00045     struct eqt
00046     {
00047         inline bool operator ()  (char * arg1, char * arg2) const
00048         {
00049             return arg1 == arg2;
00050         }
00051     };
00052 #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00053     struct my_hash_comp
00054     {
00055         size_t operator() (char * arg) const
00056         {
00057             return long (arg);
00058         }
00059         bool operator() (char * a, char * b) const
00060         {
00061             return (long (a) < long (b));
00062         }
00063         enum
00064         {               // parameters for hash table
00065             bucket_size = 4,                    // 0 < bucket_size
00066             min_buckets = 8
00067         };              // min_buckets = 2 ^^ N, 0 < N
00068     };
00069     stdext::hash_map<char *, tag, my_hash_comp > tags;
00070 #else
00071     __gnu_cxx::hash_map<char *, tag, hash_fct, eqt > tags;
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00075     boost::mutex mutex1;
00076 #else
00077     mutex mutex1;
00078 #endif
00079 
00080     static debugmon * instance;
00081 
00082     inline debugmon() { }
00083 public:
00084 
00085     void block_allocated(char * ptr, char * end, size_t size);
00086     void block_deallocated(char * ptr);
00087     void io_started(char * ptr);
00088     void io_finished(char * ptr);
00089 
00090     inline static debugmon * get_instance ()
00091     {
00092         if (!instance)
00093             instance = new debugmon ();
00094 
00095         return instance;
00096     }
00097 };
00098
